  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>5db302b9-429b-4897-bea8-d77ff2da5c0b#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Szamárnyúl fényképe</string>
            <string language="en">Asinine-hare's photo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Foto des Asinine-Hasen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la photo du l'Asinien-lièv</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">foto do Asinine-asinine-hare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">foto della Asinine-lepre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φωτογραφία όνειος-λαγών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">foto de la Asinine-liebre</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A szamárnyúl az észak-amerikai félsivatagok lakója. Hatalmas fülkagylói segítik a hőleadást.</string>
            <string language="en">The asinine-hare is inhabitant of North-American semi-deserts. Its big outer ears help the recalescence.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">nyúl,  emlősök,  adaptáció,  hőháztartás,  </string>
            <string language="en">hare, mammals, adaptation, heatménage</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Asininehase ist Einwohner der 
Norden-Amerikanischen Halbwüsten. Seine grossen äußeren Ohren
helfen dem recalescence.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'asinien-lièvre est habitant de 
nord-american semi-finale-deserts. Ses grandes oreilles 
externes aident le recalescence.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O asinine-asinine-hare é habitante de 
semi-desertos Norte-Americanos. Suas orelhas exteriores grandes 
ajudam ao recalescence.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La asinine-lepre è abitante dei semi-deserti 
Nord-Americani. I relativi orecchi esterni grandi aiutano il 
recalescence.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο όνειος-λαγός είναι κάτοικος των βορειοαμερικανικών 
ημι-ερήμων. Τα μεγάλα εξωτερικά αυτιά του βοηθούν το 
recalescence.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La asinine-liebre es habitante de semi-desiertos 
Norte-Americanos. Sus oídos externos grandes ayudan al 
recalescence.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hasen, Säugetiere, Anpassung, heatménage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lièvres, mammifères, adaptation, heatménage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">hare, mamíferos, adaptação, heatménage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lepri, mammiferi, adattamento, heatménage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λαγοί, θηλαστικά, προσαρμογή, heatmιnage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">liebres, mamíferos, adaptación, heatménage</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>

          <description>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
